name: AS_GCM_QE_getRefData_V1
description: Returns a list of reference data
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_DATA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Data',
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "refType",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!refTypes
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!refDataId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true
    )
  },
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  sort: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "sortOrder", ascending: true),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "refLabel", ascending: true)
  }
)
